text: Youku Privacy Policy
Effective date: February 23, 2022
Version: 2022 V1.1
【introduction】
You are welcome to use our products and services!

We know the importance of personal information to you. Your trust is very important to us. We will strictly abide by laws and regulations to take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information security and controlling.

Based on this, service provider Youku Information Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd. (or "we") formulates this "Youku Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred toIn the process of our products and services, how will we collect, use, share, store, and protect your personal information, as well as how you can manage your personal information so that you can make better choices.

Before you start using our products and services, please read and understand this policy carefully. In particular, we should focus on reading the clauses we logging in the threatening of the body/coarse body to ensure that you fully understand and agree to use it before starting to use.
The professional vocabulary involved in this policy, we try to explain to you in a concise and popular expression in order to facilitate your understanding.
If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the content of this policy, you can contact us through the contact information at the end of this policy.

You agree that the privacy policy said that you have understood the functions provided by the application, and the necessary personal information required for functional operation, and give corresponding collection and use authorization, but it does not mean that you have agreed to open up additional functions and handle non -necessary personal information.The opening, processing non -necessary personal information and processing sensitive personal information, we will solicit your consent separately according to your actual usage.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Agree with the privacy policy that you have given the necessary personal information for the need for functional operation to collect and use it, but it does not mean that you have agreed to open up additional functions and handle unnecessary personal information.

text: This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. Scope of application
2. Information collection and use
3. Provide information to the outside world
Fourth, your rights
5. Storage of information
6. Policy update
7. Protection of minors
Eight, contact us
Appendix: Related Definition
1. Scope of application

This policy is applicable to Youku service providers with Youku.com (Youku.com), Youku client (including but not limited to iOS version, Android version, etc.), small programs, and new forms that appear with technology development to you.and service.

Except for the relevant information collection and use activities explained by this policy, this policy is a uniform content that is uniformly applicable to all products and/or services of Youku. When you use any of our products and/or services, this policy is applicable, but as it shouldIf the product and/or service set the privacy clause/privacy agreement separately, the individual privacy terms/privacy agreements are preferred;
The content of the privacy clause/privacy agreement is not mentioned, and this policy is applicable.
But please note that this policy is not applicable to the following situations:
1. The information collection/processing practice of providing advertising services for our products and/or services;

2. Our products and/or services may include or link information or third -party services provided by third parties (including any third -party applications, websites, products, services, etc.).Using such information or services has nothing to do with us.

We will remind you here that when you use third -party information or services, you should pay attention and read the relevant user agreement and personal information protection policies you displayed in the third direction, and provide your personal information properly and carefully.

This policy is only applicable to your personal information we collected, and it is not applicable to the collection of your personal information of any third party, as well as any third -party service or third -party information use rules.The behavior of storage and use of your personal information will not be responsible for the scope of law.
2. Information collection and use
When you use our products and/or services, your personal information we need/may need to collect and use includes the following: below:
1. To achieve the basic functions of providing you with/or services to you, you must authorize us to collect and use the necessary information.
If you refuse to provide the corresponding information, you will not be able to use our products and/or services normally;
2. In order to provide you with additional functions to our products and/or services, you can choose to agree or disagree with the information we collected and used alone.

If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or cannot achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, which will not affect your basic functions.
We are here to remind you that we are committed to creating a variety of products and services to meet your needs.

Because there are many types and services we provide to you, and the specific products and/or service range that different users choose to use, the basic/additional functions and the personal information types and scope of personal information and use will be different.The specific products and/or service functions are subject to.
The specific feature scenarios we will provide you include::
(1) Account registration/login and authentication
(1) Account registration/login

[Account Registration] When you register our products and/or services, in order to help you complete the registration process, you need to provide us with your mobile phone number and verify, and create a username and password.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your mobile phone number for verification, and create a username and password.

text: Collecting such information is to meet the real -name system requirements of relevant laws and regulations. This kind of information is a necessary information for this function. If you do not provide such information, it will cause registration failure, but it will not affect your viewing, searching, and playback of video.Function.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not provide mobile phone number information, you will fail to register, but it will not affect your browsing, searching, and playback function of your video.

text: In addition, you can also fill in the name, region and other information according to your own needs.

First Party Collection Information

text: (2) Identity verification

When you use information release (such as live broadcast), "Youku", online game user real -name registration and transaction, purchase of business performance tickets, purchase related financial products or services, enterprise performance to deduct and pay personal income taxMeet the relevant legal regulations and regulatory requirements, ensure the authenticity of the user's identity, and realize the risk control of anti -fraud, or to ensure the safety of systems and services. You may need to certify your identity before using specific functions and/or services.

We will need to collect your identity authentication information (may include names, ID card -related information, facial feature information, and mobile phone numbers) to complete real -name authentication.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

If you choose online authentication, we will need to collect your identity authentication information (including name, ID card -related information, facial feature information) to complete the certification.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: (5) Place order and payment

When you purchase our products and/or services, such as VIP members, movie tickets, free streaming packages, U beans, star coins, coupon packages, U diamonds, Youku services, etc., we need to Collect some or all of the following personal information, including: transaction goods or service information, consignee information (consignee name, delivery address and contact number, if the consignee is not your own, you should ensure that you have obtained the consignee relevant authorization), transaction amount, order time, order merchant, order number, order status, payment method, payment account number, and payment status. We collect this information to help you complete the transaction smoothly, ensure your transaction security, and inquire about the order information and provide customer service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

Data Security

text: (6) Content display and recommendation

In order to better provide you with content recommendation and display, optimize search results, understand the adaptability of products to different hardware devices, ensure the security of the operating environment, and identify abnormal account statuses, etc., we will collect information about your use of our products or services. The information of the way, and correlating the information, the information includes: 1. Device information: We will receive and record information about the device you use (such as device model, operating system version, device settings, MAC address and IMEI, IDFA, OAID) based on the specific operations you authorized during software installation and/or use. (such as device identification code, device environment, mobile application list and other software and hardware feature information), device location information (including your authorized GPS location and sensor information such as WLAN access point, Bluetooth and base station);
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect and correlate the following information, including: 1. Device Information.

text: 2.Log Information: When you use the products or services provided by our website or client, we will automatically collect the detailed usage of your service as the relevant network log preservation.

text: (9) Provide you with security

In order to improve the security of your services to provide services with our affiliated companies and partners, protect the safety of personal property of you or other users or the public, and better prevent fishing websites, fraud, network vulnerabilities, computer viruses, cyber attacks, Internet intrusion risk, more accurately identify the situation of violations of laws and regulations or Youku related agreements, rules, and rules.Your member information, transaction information, equipment information, service log information, and information that our affiliated companies and partners obtain your authorization or sharing according to law (Among them, we may collect MAC addresses, IMEI and other device logos during the application background operation period.The risk check) to comprehensively judge your account and transaction risk, conduct authentication, test and prevent security incidents, and take necessary records, audit, analysis, and disposal measures in accordance with the law.

Important
First Party Collection Information

text: (2) Services of cookies and similar technologies
Cookie and similar device information identification technology are commonly used in the Internet.

When you use our service, we may use related technologies to send one or more, cookie, or anonymous identifiers (hereinafter referred to as "Cookie") to collect, identify and store your access, use this product, use this productInformation about time.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Send one or more cookies or anonymous identifiers (hereinafter referred to as "Cookie") to your device to collect, identify and store information when you access and use this product.

text: We promise that cookies will not be used for any other purposes other than the purpose of this privacy policy.

We use Cookie to ensure the safety and efficient operation of products and services. It can make us confirm the security status of your account and transaction, check the related abnormal conditions of collapse and delay, and help you save the steps of filling in your form and entering search content.And process.
At the same time, we may use Cookie to show you the information or functions you may be interested in and optimize your choice of advertising.

Most browsers provide users with the function of removing the browser cache data. You can perform the corresponding data clearing operation, or you can modify the degree of acceptance of cookies or reject our cookies.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can perform the corresponding data clearing operation, or you can modify the degree of acceptance of Cookie or reject our cookies.

text: You may not be able to use services or corresponding functions that depend on cookies because of these modifications.

(1) Sharing
We will not share your personal information with companies, organizations and individuals other than Youku service providers, except the following situations:

Risk

text: (4) Prevention of account security risk
When using our products and/or services, you inevitably disclose your personal information to the other party or the potential transaction of the transaction, such as contact or contact address.
In addition, you can also establish communication, exchange information or analysis content with our services.

Please protect your personal information properly, provides others only under the necessary circumstances, and do not trust the transaction through other trading tools to avoid the stolen information or even encounter telecommunications network fraud.

If you are worried that your personal information, especially your account or password, please contact our customer service immediately so that we can take corresponding measures according to your application, you can also be in "My-Settings-Account and Security Center-Security Center"Autonomous" login equipment management ".
6. Policy update
In order to bring you a better product and service experience, we continue to strive to improve our products, services and technology.

When the new service and business processes change, we may update our privacy policies, to inform you the specific changes through the announcement of Youku platform announcement or system message and other appropriate ways.
But without your clear consent, we will not limit your rights you enjoy in accordance with this policy.
For major changes, we will also provide more significant notifications (including we will provide you with pop -up window prompts).
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: For major changes, we will also provide more significant notifications (including we will provide you with pop -up window prompts).

text: The major changes in this policy include, but not limited to:
1. The business model of the product has changed significantly.
Such as the purpose of handling personal information, the type of personal information, and the use of personal information;

2. The main body of the privacy policy caused by business adjustment and transaction mergers and acquisitions, and the new subject receiving party changes the original processing purpose and method of treatment;
3. The main object of personal information sharing or public disclosure changes;
4. User personal information rights and their exercise methods have changed significantly;
5. When dealing with the person in charge of the person in charge of the personal information protection and the change of complaint channels;
6. Personal information protection assessment report shows that the existence of products has a significant impact on personal rights.
We will also archive the old version of this policy on the special page of Youku for you to check.
7. Protection of minors
We attach great importance to the protection of personal information for minors.

If you are a minor, we ask you to ask your parents or other guardians to read this policy carefully, and use our services or provide information to us under the consent of your parents or other guardians.

Important

Appendix: Related Definition
Youku: It refers to Youku.com operated by Youku Information Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd., and the carrier includes but not limited to web pages (youku.com), APP applications, applets, etc.
Related company: Refers to the affiliated company of Youku service providers disclosed by the latest listed company annual report of Alibaba Group Holding Limited (Alibaba Group Holding Limited.
Personal information: Various information related to the recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other ways, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Sensitive personal information: Once sensitive personal information is leaked or illegally, it is easy to lead to personal information that is harmful to natural person's personality dignity or personality and property security.Track information, and personal information of minors under the age of 14.
Personal information deletion: Refers to removing personal information in a system involved in daily business functions, so that it keeps them from being retrieved and accessed.
Child: Refers to minors under the age of 14.

Equipment information: Including device identifiers (IMEI, IDFA, Android ID, Mac, OAID, IMSI and other device -related information), application information (application crash information, notification switch status, application installation list, and other application related information), equipment parameters), equipment parametersAnd system information (device type, device model, operating system and hardware -related information), device network environment information (IP address, WIFI information, base station information and other network -related information).
The actual collection of the product shall prevail.

Service log information: Including search and browsing records, attention, playback records, visits, playback duration, IP address, WLAN network, telecommunications operator network, language, access date and time.
Decoration: Refers to the process of personal information processing, so that it cannot recognize specific natural persons without using additional information.
Anonymous: Refers to the process that personal information cannot identify specific natural persons and cannot recover.
<the-end-of-privacy-policy>
